sentences.english: The Great walks with the Small without fear. The Middling keeps aloof.
sentences.chinese: 大的不怕与小的同游，居中的却远而避之。

sentences.english: A successful avoidance of collision depends on the information collection and procession regarding relate anti-collision information.
sentences.chinese: 一次成功的避碰取决于对相关避碰信息的采集和处理。

sentences.english: The extracts had evident oviposition deterrence to the adults of Plutella xylostella.
sentences.chinese: 黄荆提取物对小菜蛾成虫产卵有明显的忌避作用。

sentences.english: DFS can be used to construct quantum error avoiding code which is fault tolerant automatically.
sentences.chinese: 利用DFS的特性可以实现自动容错的量子避错码。

sentences.english: The storm caused the collapse of the wooden shelter.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨使这个避风雨的木棚倒塌了。

sentences.english: Fortunately the librarian called me and my father came into his office.
sentences.chinese: 幸好图书馆馆长请我和爸爸到他办公室避避雨。

sentences.english: Therefore it is important to make the best use of their advantages while avoiding their disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 所以如何扬其长而避其短，成为我们的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: The results show that the treated fabric has good anti-mosquito effect.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，整理后的产品具有良好的避蚊效果。

sentences.english: Be stage series measure in succession by percussive country wary avoid not as good as.
sentences.chinese: 受到冲击的国家纷纷出台系列措施唯恐避之不及。

sentences.english: Several people herded under an awning to get out the shower.
sentences.chinese: 几个人聚集在门栅下避阵雨。

sentences.english: His brutal nature, notorious, it is always less than fear.
sentences.chinese: 他凶残成性，恶名远播，人们总是避之惟恐不及。

sentences.english: A kind of track planning method for time-optimal and collision avoidance dual robots was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种双机器人时间优化的避碰轨迹规划方法。

sentences.english: 'The only way to avoid stress is to die, ' says Dr. Hans Selye.
sentences.chinese: “唯一的办法避压力便是死亡”，汉斯医生说。

sentences.english: Dogs sad night nine sister suspected him, avoid dont avoid.
sentences.chinese: 夜犬伤心九妹怀疑他，避也不避。

sentences.english: For some reason, all the other kids shun him.
sentences.chinese: 因为一些原因，其他所有的小孩都对他避之不及。

sentences.english: His horse had not drawn them far, however, when it suddenly shied aside and came to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的马没跑多远，就突然避到路边停了下来。
